001package Binary_Regions;
002
003import java.awt.Color;
004import java.util.List;
005
006import ij.ImagePlus;
007import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
008import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
009import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
010import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
011import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Point;
012import imagingbook.pub.regions.RegionContourLabeling;
013import imagingbook.pub.regions.RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion;
014
015/**
016 * Shows each region's major axis as a vector scaled by the region's eccentricity.
017 * Also demonstrates the use of the region property scheme, i.e., how
018 * to assign numeric properties to regions and retrieve them afterwards.
019 * @author W. Burger
020 * @version 2015-12-03
021 */
022public class Major_Axis_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
023        
024//      static {imagingbook.lib.ij.IjLogStream.redirectSystem();}
025        
026        static double VectorLength = 30;
027        static Color CenterColor = Color.blue;
028        static Color MajorAxisColor = CenterColor;
029        static int LineWidth = 1;
030        
031        private String title = null;
032
033        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
034                title = im.getShortTitle();
035                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES;
036        }
037
038        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
039                
040                // perform region segmentation:
041                RegionContourLabeling segmenter = new RegionContourLabeling((ByteProcessor) ip);
042                List<BinaryRegion> regions = segmenter.getRegions(true);
043
044                // calculate and register certain region properties:
045                for (BinaryRegion r : regions) {
046                        calculateRegionProperties(r);
047                }
048                
049                // create the output (color) image:
050                ColorProcessor cp = ip.convertToColorProcessor();
051                cp.add(210);
052                
053                // draw major axis vectors (scaled by eccentricity): 
054                
055                for (BinaryRegion r : regions) {
056                        if (r.getSize() > 10) {
057                                double theta = r.getProperty("theta");
058//                              double ecc1 = r.getProperty("ecc1");
059        //                      double ecc2 = r.getProperty("ecc2");
060                                int u0 = (int) Math.round(r.getXc());
061                                int v0 = (int) Math.round(r.getYc());
062                                int u1 = (int) Math.round(r.getXc() + VectorLength * Math.cos(theta));
063                                int v1 = (int) Math.round(r.getYc() + VectorLength * Math.sin(theta));
064                                
065                                drawCenter(cp,  u0,  v0);
066                                drawAxis(cp, u0, v0, u1, v1);
067                        }
068                }
069                
070                // display the output image
071                new ImagePlus(title + "-major-axis", cp).show();
072        }
073        
074        private void calculateRegionProperties(BinaryRegion r) {
075                // calculate central moment mu11, mu20, mu02:
076                double xc = r.getXc();
077                double yc = r.getYc();
078                double mu11 = 0;
079                double mu20 = 0;
080                double mu02 = 0;
081                for (Point p : r) {
082                        double dx = (p.getX() - xc);
083                        double dy = (p.getY() - yc);
084                        mu11 = mu11 + dx * dy;
085                        mu20 = mu20 + dx * dx;
086                        mu02 = mu02 + dy * dy;
087                }
088                
089                // calculate orientation of major axis
090                r.setProperty("theta", 0.5 * Math.atan2(2 * mu11, mu20 - mu02));
091                
092                // calculate 2 versions of eccentricity
093                double a = mu20 + mu02;
094                double b = Math.sqrt(Math.pow(mu20 - mu02, 2) + 4 * mu11 * mu11);
095                r.setProperty("ecc1", (a + b) / (a - b));
096                r.setProperty("ecc2", (Math.pow(mu20 - mu02,  2) + 4 * mu11 * mu11) / Math.pow(mu20 + mu02, 2));
097        }
098        
099        void drawCenter(ImageProcessor ip, int uc, int vc) {
100                ip.setColor(CenterColor);
101                ip.setLineWidth(LineWidth);
102                ip.drawRect(uc - 2, vc - 2, 5, 5);
103        }
104        
105        void drawAxis(ImageProcessor ip, int u0, int v0, int u1, int v1) {
106                ip.setColor(MajorAxisColor);
107                ip.setLineWidth(LineWidth);
108                ip.drawLine(u0, v0, u1, v1);
109        }
110
111}
